quote: A society whose events have always been informative and therefore worth attending.
author: Harshit Sharma
position: Ex-President IE(I) CUIET , Software Engineer @ Toddle

quote: Hard working team and value everyone's time and acknowledges you for your hard work.
author: Abhishek Singla

quote: Working in this society has helped me to explore diversity in my work.
author: Bhavika Malhotra
